entry.title: New BIP Editors: 1 Year Later
entry.summary: Jon expresses satisfaction with the current dynamics within the group, highlighting the active day-to-day involvement of both himself and Murch in managing the repository. This level of engagement has facilitated ease of coordination and prevented the complications that can arise from having too many individuals directly involved in the process. Additionally, Jon appreciates the contributions of the other editors who, despite being less visible on a daily basis, have played a significant role through their responsiveness in private messages and consultations, especially regarding discussions on Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs) issues. He notes that this setup of having two editors actively involved on a daily basis, coupled with the support and expertise of the other editors on an as-needed basis, has resulted in an effective and enjoyable collaboration experience.
